about_the_game:
Missed out on the Lystide event items? No worries! This pack lets you buy all the exclusive decorations and items available during the event. Purchased items will appear in your inventory, ready to transform your island into a winter wonderland. Deck the halls with festive decor to spread holiday cheer across Ikonei Island!

The Lystide Content Pack Includes:
  • Enjoy the enchanting and fragrant Lysrose & Lysrose Fruit
  • Dine in style with the Lystide Table and chair
  • Adorn your home with the timeless Lystide Wreath
  • Sink into comfort on the Lystide Sofa
  • Indulge in freshly-baked Lystide bread
  • Enhance your attire with the Lystide Hat
  • Delight in the Lystide Tree adorned with festive decorations
  • Unwrap the magic of Lystide gifts
  • surround your garden or farm with the charming Lystide Fence
  • Showcase your treasures on the Lystide shelf
  • Adopt the adorable Lystide Pet Rock
  • Capture the enchantment of winter with the Lystide snowglobe
  • Lysrose Folded Napkin
  • Enhance your Lystide feasts with Tofurkey, Mashed Pumpkin and Peas
  • Transform your living space with the Lystide Coffee Table
  • Decorate your home with the Lystide Arch
  • Illuminate your nights with the radiant Lysma Star

short_description: Missed out on the Lystide event items? This pack lets you buy all the exclusive decorations and items to spruce up your island with festive cheer! Deck out your island in style with holiday-themed decor and make it a winter wonderland to remember!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Norwegian*, Simplified Chinese, Indonesian, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
